committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, Reserved Water and Resource Conservation

official_title: A bill to provide for the conveyance of certain public lands in Oconto and Marinette Counties, Wisconsin.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to convey specified lands in Oconto and Marinette Counties, Wisconsin, to any citizen of the United States who claims and demonstrates possession of such portion of land.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the conveyance of certain public lands in Oconto and Marinette Counties, Wisconsin.
